summary: Set in Korea and made during the war, this is the love story of a hard-bitten Army surgeon, and a new nurse ready to save the world.
cast: Humphrey Bogart|June Allyson|Keenan Wynn|Robert Keith|William Campbell|Perry Sheehan|Patricia Tiernan|Adele Longmire|Jonathan Cott|Ann Morrison|Helen Winston|Sarah Selby|Danny Chang|Philip Ahn|Steve Forrest|Jeff Richards|Dick Simmons|Ralph Ahn|Patrick Allen|Robert Board|Robert Carson|W.T. title: Campo de batalla
